title: Bianca Gascoigne leaves sizzles in a gold bikini as she rings in her 33rd birthday in Marbella
text:
She recently revealed she underwent a Brazilian bum lift last year after her body dysmorphia left her feeling like a 'fat, chubby kid'.

And Bianca Gascoigne proudly displayed the results of her procedure as she posed up a storm for a photoshoot in Marbella, Spain, earlier this week.

The glamour model - who turns 33 on Monday - sent temperatures soaring as she slipped into a gold barely-there bikini, complete with sequins throughout.

Working it: Bianca Gascoigne - who turns 33 on Monday - proudly displayed the results of her Brazilian bum lift as she posed up a storm for a photoshoot in Marbella, Spain, earlier this week

Showing off her peachy and ample bust, the media personality commanded attention in a string bralet and a pair of racy thongs.

The CBB star ensured focus remained on her killer physique as she kept accessories to a minimum by sporting a dainty silver necklace.

With her golden locks dressed into glamorous waves, the 2006 Love Island winner accentuated her beauty with matte foundation, fluttery false lashes and nude lipgloss.

Scantily-clad: Showing off her peachy and ample bust, the media personality commanded attention in a string bralet and a pair of racy thongs

Less is more: The CBB star ensured focus remained on her killer physique as she kept accessories to a minimum by sporting a dainty silver necklace

Bianca's outing comes after she discussed how mental disorder body dysmorphia contributed to having a bum lift back in November.

Appearing on Lisa Snowdon's Fabulous Magazine podcast, Things I Told My Daughter, the social media sensation said: 'It’s something I thought about for years and years and, like I said, I have this body dysmorphia.

'I have tried to get my bum how I wanted but I never really got there so I saw this as an option, but it really was a scary thing.'

Body dysmorphia, according to the NHS, is where a person spends a lot of time worrying about flaws in their appearance. These flaws are often unnoticeable to others.

Bianca flew to Marbella for the surgery, which is a specialized fat transfer procedure that augments the size and shape of the person's derriere without implants.

But Bianca's mum Sheryl was worried after researching the numerous health risks that arise with the surgery.

Sheryl told Lisa: 'I was exceptionally worried because it was literally a week after sadly someone passed away from the operation, I get annoyed that she doesn’t see how beautiful she is, she’s stunning and she doesn’t see that.'

After the surgery Bianca revealed she was unable to sit down for four weeks and even getting dressed now is hard for her.

Radiant: The 2006 Love Island winner accentuated her beauty with matte foundation, fluttery false lashes and nude lipgloss
description: The glamour model - who turns 33 on Monday - proudly displayed the results of her Brazilian bum lift as she posed up a storm for a photoshoot in Marbella, Spain, earlier this week.
